entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Flurries or rain showers early this morning. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
